name: Christmas Tycoon
description:
In order to prepare for the next Christmas, help Santa's daughter set up the toy factory.

Collect money to craft the Christmas workshops.

Santa's elves will help you in your quest for a successful Christmas.

Develop the workshops as much as possible in order to create a large number of toys and wrap them in gift paper.

When the gifts are completely ready and the workshop completed, reborn to start a new year with more bonuses.
